page.title: 11A Day In The Life Of Leanda
page.content: My name is Leanda and I am ten years old. I get up at eight o'clock and have coffee and toast for breakfast.I make my bed before I leave my{home life}to go to{school. I arrive at school at nine o'clock and we go in at quarter past nine.We usually sing hymns,write our news and do some maths in the morning.We have a fifteen minute break from quarter to eleven until eleven o'clock.{Lunch} time is from half past twelve until half past one.I go home for my lunch and come back to school at one o'clock. In the afternoon we do English, geography or art.School finishes at half past three,when we go home. I have tea at six o'clock and in the {evening} I play outside with friends.I go to bed at nine o'clock.
